text: Mmaa a wͻn ho nteε no wͻ mmarima a wͻn ho nteε, εna mmarima no a wͻn ho nteε no nso wͻ mmaa a wͻn ho nteε; εna mmaa papa no wͻ mmarima papa no, εna mmarima papa no nso wͻ mmaa papa no. Saa nkorͻfoͻ no na wͻ’nnim (ntwatosoͻ) a wͻ’rekeka no ho hwee. Wͻ’benya bͻnefakyε ne akyεdeε a animuonyam wͻ mu
